thread.section_title: Solar Quotes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solar Quotes | solarquotes.com.au
thread.title: Tam

author: Tam
title: Tam
text:
The website has some great info and really helped me make a decision on the direction to go, and helped me fast track my knowledge on this subject. It would have been a 3 star rating if it wasn't for the great website info.
I got all three Quote: s - 1 from the actual installer and the other two from sales people. I ended up going with a different installer altogether as I knew their quality of work and track record.
FYI - The installers pay to be in the solar Quote: s list so make sure you shop around as the best outcome for you may be someone not on the list. That said the "cheapest" Quote: was from the list.
